title: They used to call it sandy blight (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Health and hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Eye - Diseases and defects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Aboriginal Australians - Social conditions
description: Designed to reveal the problem of trachoma and other serious eye diseases common to outback Aborigines. Health problems, housing and general living conditions are also looked at. Shows how medical attention can help to alleviate problems.
